mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_users(username, password, email) VALUES(#{username},#{password},#{email} )
mapper.select: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_users ( username VARCHAR(30) PRIMARY KEY, password VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_rols ( r_username VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, r_role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (r_username) REFERENCES tbl_users(username) ON DELETE CASCADE )
